price: E dize aos que não crêem: "Fazei o que puderdes; por certo, faremos o que pudermos."
arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqul lilladhīna lā yu'minūna iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innā ʿāmilūna
